reviewText: a movie super-comic. taken from the real life very very comical. makes you laugh from beginning to end. very very real Super
This movie is so funny you would not believe , of course that depends on your sense of humor. But for me I have watched it over a dozen times.
This movie made me laugh so much! It was hilarious! It's great even if you don't speak the language! My boyfriend doesn't speak spanish and he couldn't stop laughing.

This movie is the kind of movie that if you want to see the domincan republic (punta cana resort) in action and how the people are and this country. Be aware if you go with your husband lol he will go crazy ! Understand spanish, movie talks for itself ! Buy it its great for the whole family you will laugh trust me (its a must see movie at least twice in a yrs). Enjoy !
This is one of the funniest movies I have ever seen.  Love every moment of this great comedy.  Highly recommended.

I enjoyed this dvd very much! I love the silly humor and slightly racy content. As usual the package arrived intact. No scratches or damage. It arrived quickly and exactly when expected. I enjoy  ordering on Amazon.com for all my purchases! Great site for variety, quality,speedy and easy ordering! Great job!
This movie was not that funny....there were a few jokes here and there.  I have a good sense of humor and i absolutely love to laugh but this didn't do it.
